root.name: Dragon Ball Z: Supersonic Warriors 2
root.description: Characters The character list is the main attraction in this DBZ title. Supersonic Warriors 2 features more than 30 characters, all featuring a special attack. Full Character ListPlayable Characters Goku Super SaiyanGoku Vegeta Super Saiyan VegetaMajin Vegeta Kid GohanTeen GohanSuper Saiyn 2 GohanÂ Future Trunks Super Saiyan Future Trunks Gotenks Super Saiyan 3 Gotenks Cell Cell (Second Form) Freeza Mecha Freeza Cooler Metal Cooler Good Buu Evil Buu PiccoloCaptain GinyuKrillin Android 18Dr. Gero BrolySupport CharactersYamcha / TenshinhanZarbon / DodoriaBardockDaburaCell Jr.Android 17 / Android 16Babidi Dende "Neko Majin" Z (only in Japanese version) Shenlong GameplaySupersonic Warriors 2, while similar to its predecessor, features tag-team fighting, and incorporates this style of fighting into many different modes. Players choose three characters to form a team another enemy, or team of enemies.Controls A Button- energy blast B Button- block X Button- light punch/kick Y Button- heavy punch/kick R Button- gather energy L Button- special power A R Button- super attack B Y Button- throw B R Button- energy barrier Touch Screen- summon character, team attack
